body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for your chat yesterday.

As discussed, Kindly grant us view-only access to the workspace to take a look. To give the Support team access:
  • Log into DummyPay
  • Ensure that you are in the workspace that you need to grant access to by checking that the correct workspace name appears in the top left-hand corner of the screen. Switch workspace if you need to by clicking on the switch link that appears when hovering the mouse next to the workspace name. Alternatively, go to the Profile icon and click on Companies.
  • Once you’re in the correct workspace, click on the Help icon (question mark) in the top right-hand corner and select Support.
  • Scroll down to the Grant Access button and click on it.
Once done, please advise the name of the workspace and employee shared along with the period you are referring to?

Looking forward to your feedback 

Kind regards,

Jordan B
Product Specialist

The information in this email and any attachments is confidential and is intended only for the use of the above-named recipient. The workspace accepts no liability for the content of this email, or for the consequences of any actions taken on the basis of the information provided unless that information is subsequently confirmed in writing. If you are not the intended recipient, any dissemination, distribution or copying of this email is strictly prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please advise immediately by return email.

To give the Support team access:   Log into DummyPay  Ensure that you are in the workspace that you need to grant access to by checking that the correct workspace name appears in the top left-hand corner of the screen. Switch workspace if you need to by clicking on the switch link that appears when hovering the mouse next to the workspace name. Alternatively, go to the Profile icon and click on Companies.  Once you’re in the correct workspace, click on the Help icon (question mark) in the top right-hand corner and select Support.  Scroll down to the Grant Access button and click on it.   Once done, please advise the name of the workspace and employee shared along with the period you are referring to? If you have received this email in error, please advise immediately by return email.

Thank you.

Best regards,
Chris A

Best,
Chris

body:
Hello Support,

I am experiencing an issue with the system. It crashes whenever I try to generate a report.

Regards,
Jamie K
body_text: Hello Support, I am experiencing an issue with the system. It crashes whenever I try to generate a report. Regards, Jamie K

body:
Hello Jamie,

We are sorry to hear that you are experiencing issues. Can you please provide more details about the error message you receive when the system crashes?

Best regards,
Alex P
Support Team
body_text: Hello Jamie, We are sorry to hear that you are experiencing issues. Can you please provide more details about the error message you receive when the system crashes? Best regards, Alex P Support Team
